name: grog
text: This is pretty much my favorite drink to make while watching anything from the 80's

name: ferdinand
text: i once drank them with a man who looked freakishly like michael douglas after he towed my boat home when the motor died.  it didn't help that i was high and kept asking him about the chick from "romancing the stone."

name: nigelchaos
text: Did he try any romancing the stoned?.. If you're picking up what I'm putting down..

name: farqussus
text: don't pick it up. we all know where it's been.

name: cracklewater
text:
I just accidentally mixed up a bunch of these while at work today. Fucking delicious and highly effective.

I love relaxed working environments.

name: benhead
text:
Accidentally?

"Awww, I spilled my Stoli Vanil and Sunkist all over the--hey, yum!"

name: catachresis
text: Cornelius starts to get some character. A Good Thing.

name: bron
text: Funny and educational; Achewood has it all.

name: juancarlos
text: A comment left by juancarlos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, bassguitarbill, J-Man)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dismas, goocifer, farqussus, abreez_e, Baryonyx, mystkmanat)

name: rowboat
text:
...you must be 5% smarter than poor editing....

and you fail.

name: saint
text: I see what you did there.

name: jokercross
text: How indeed

name: ambala
text: The first of many a fantastic Achewood cocktail.

name: chaesar
text: First Achewood recipe. I submitted a drink recipe to Onstad and never heard back. It was a minty, creamy apertif.

name: a_dude
text: Cornelius as we know him begins here.

name: kleric
text: This has become one of my favorite drinks.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: But what's it called?

name: tellumo
text: Why, it's called an Orange Creamsicle Alcohol Drink, just like the title says!

name: songbirdspectre
text: his hat. oh jeez.

name: never_die
text: The entire wearing of the chef's outfit for preparing a drink that's main ingredient is orange soda is perhaps one of the better gags of early Achewood.

name: zefiel
text: The best Birthday ever was when a buddy gave me a bottle of Absolut Vainilla as a present and i could finally prepare this.

name: dicklaurent
text: I read this strip earlier today, and now I'm sitting here with a bottle of Absolut Vanilla and orange soda. It tastes pretty fine.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i was staying with my girlfriend and her extended family once and her uncle had spent all day talking about creamsicles. After supper when we finally got around to drinking some, I ripped Cornelius' line and the family swooned for my Old World Charm. Thanks, Corny.

name: farqussus
text: You mean they weren't impressed by your Old World Moustache?

name: buttermoths
text: This Tuesday I wanted to order this drink, having done so many times before, but they didn't have vanilla vodka. Instead we went for a mix of Fanta, Sprite, Vodka and Cream. The taste was similar, the vomit was not.

name: mindbnder
text:
Also vintagely delicious:
Orange Flintstone's Pushup:
1 part Amaretto
3 part Orange juice
1 part cream
stir over rocks.
delicious .

name: tekende
text: Does it really taste like a Flintstones pushup? Those things are so awesome. I need to try this drink sometime.

name: mindbnder
text: It does.  I once drank 4 in 10 minutes due to the high content of deliciousness and was promptly drunk.

name: greyfield
text:
Oh my goodness, good sir, that sounds delicious. Hell, the next chance I get, I will try this. Or its closest equivalent, which for me would probably be a White Russian replacing the Kahlua with orange juice, which will make me feel rotten all over. But it won't be your fault.

Anyway. Chubby.

name: meetzorp
text: 4 because this is hella information to have if you're ever throwing a bachelorette party and know no other frilly drinks beyond Tequila Sunsets.

name: c_dizzle
text:
I believe it's tequila sunRISE...but i suppose too many of them would make the title you chose more appropriate.

there are hell of frilly drinks such as tequila sunrises', btw.

name: zapatos
text: Bachelorette Party = Chicks.  I doubt many females are good at getting other females crazy hammered, unless they are gay.  I am pretty good at it, because I am ugly and a huge jerk.  Margaritas.

name: chachibenji
text: If I drank this would probably be awesome.

name: em2
text: Wait! This flavor is from...History!

name: sparhawk
text: We talking Mark Twain or Lonis Edison here?

name: tehfluffeh
text: This drink was served at Onstad's signing at Skeleton Key Tattoo in Portland, OR. They called it "The Achewood."

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i'd waited around five years to make out with this one girl.
this drink helped me do that.

thank you, Onstad.

name: history
text: In going through the archives again, old stories like this intrigue me.  What happened with this girl?  Do you now regret this episode, or does it have a nostalgic flavor?

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text: First time that the Cornelius we know begins to appear, using antiquated but highly articulated English.

name: razorman57
text: I think this might be the first strip where cornelius starts to get some of his personality.
